operation_mode.label: Operation Mode
operation_mode.comment: In simulation mode the general merchant ID on the simulation plattform is used. In simulation mode the test cards must be used. After you received the merchant ID you should switch to live mode.

live_merchant_id.label: Live Merchant ID
live_merchant_id.comment: Enter here the live merchant ID. This merchant ID is used only when the live operation mode is used.

live_secret_key.label: Live Secret Key
live_secret_key.comment: Enter here the live secret key. You can get the secret key from the extranet. This secret key is used only when the live operation mode is used. The secret key is used to sign the request done to BNP Paribas Mercanet.

live_secret_key_version.label: Live Secret Key Version
live_secret_key_version.comment: Enter here the live secret key version. You can get the secret key version from the extranet. This secret key is used only when the live operation mode is used.

transaction_reference_schema.label: Transaction Reference Prefix
transaction_reference_schema.comment: Here you can insert an transaction reference prefix. The prefix allows you to change the order number that is transmitted to BNP Paribas Mercanet. The prefix must contain the tag {id}. It will then be replaced by the order number (e.g. name_{id}).

template_name.label: Template Name
template_name.comment: If you created a special template at BNP Paribas Mercanet. It will then be used for the payment page.

cancel_existing_orders.label: Cancel pending orders when out of stock
cancel_existing_orders.comment: If a product is in stock only once and the payment of the customer ordering this product fails or is aborted, it won't be available until the order is canceled (see timeout option below). Enable this setting to cancel the customer's pending orders when he returns to the cart page and a product is not available anymore. Be careful though: If you enable this option, there is a chance that payments are made with the corresponding order being already canceled.

cancel_pending_orders.label: Timeout for pending orders
cancel_pending_orders.comment: Define the number of seconds after which orders with a pending payment will be cancelled automatically.

wait_for_success.label: Wait On Success Page
wait_for_success.comment: In some cases the transaction requires a few seconds until it is successfully authorized. When this option is enabled the user is hold until the transaction reach the final state. If this is not the case in 30 seconds a message is shown to the customer, which explains the situation.

logging_level.label: Logging Level
logging_level.comment: Messages of this or a higher level will be logged.

recurring.label: Recurring Payments
recurring.comment: If you would like to use recurring payments, you need our magento module "Customweb Subscription". For further information go to sellxed.com.

show_image.label: Show the payment image
show_image.comment: Show the payment image on the checkout page

show_payment_id.label: Show the payment id
show_payment_id.comment: Show the payment id in the order information

Currency.label: Currency
Currency.comment: Allowed currencies for this payment method

use_base_currency.label: Use base currency
use_base_currency.comment: Send amounts to BNP Paribas Mercanet in base currency.

settlement.label: Invoice settlement
settlement.comment: Choose settlement after order in case you want an invoice to be created with your oder. The state of the invoice will set according to your capture status

invoice_send_email.label: Send invoice email
invoice_send_email.comment: Send the invoice email automatically after invoice creation.

capturing.label: Capturing Delay
capturing.comment: This option defines how many days the transaction remains open after authorization. A value of 0 means that the authorization is captured as soon as possible. If you disable this function, you have to manually capture the transaction before it expires We recommend you to define a cron job in your shop especially if the capture delay is greater than 0 in order to automatically update the transaction status. How this can be done is described in the latest version of the integration manual. Please check with BNP Paribas Mercanet which delay is possible and what implication a delay may have.

credit_card_brands.label: Credit Card Brands
credit_card_brands.comment: You can restrict the usable cards for this payment method by this setting. Only the selected one can be used by the customer.

threed_secure_min_amount.label: 3D Secure Minimum amount
threed_secure_min_amount.comment: If an order total is below the specified amount, it will be processed without 3d Secure. Note Non-3D Secure Transactions will cause that the merchant is liable in case of a charge back. As a merchant you take the risk of not being paid for this transaction in case the client challenges the transaction.

nfois.label: Payment Plans
nfois.comment: Enable the configured payment plans for this method.

status_success_after_uncertain.label: Successful Payments after uncertain
status_success_after_uncertain.comment: You can specify the order status for orders that are successful after being in a uncertain state.

status_refused_after_uncertain.label: Refused Payments after uncertain
status_refused_after_uncertain.comment: You can specify the order status for orders that are refused after being in a uncertain state.

status_authorized.label: Authorized Status
status_authorized.comment: This status is set, when the payment was successfull and it is authorized.

status_uncertain.label: Uncertain Status
status_uncertain.comment: You can specify the order status for new orders that have an uncertain authorisation status.

status_captured.label: Captured Status
status_captured.comment: You can specify the order status for orders that are captured either directly after the order or manually in the backend.

authorizationMethod.label: Authorization Method
authorizationMethod.comment: Select the authorization method to use for processing this payment method.

alias_manager.label: Alias Manager
alias_manager.comment: The alias manager allows the customer to select from a credit card previously stored. The sensitive data is stored by BNP Paribas Mercanet.

show_image.label: Show the payment image
show_image.comment: Show the payment image on the checkout page

show_payment_id.label: Show the payment id
show_payment_id.comment: Show the payment id in the order information

As a merchant you take the risk of not being paid for this transaction in case the client challenges the transaction.

nfois.comment: Enable the configured payment plans for this method.

status_success_after_uncertain.comment: You can specify the order status for orders that are successful after being in a uncertain state.

status_refused_after_uncertain.comment: You can specify the order status for orders that are refused after being in a uncertain state.

show_image.comment: Show the payment image on the checkout page

show_payment_id.label: Show the payment id
show_payment_id.comment: Show the payment id in the order information

Currency.label: Currency
Currency.comment: Allowed currencies for this payment method

use_base_currency.label: Use base currency
use_base_currency.comment: Send amounts to BNP Paribas Mercanet in base currency.

settlement.label: Invoice settlement
settlement.comment: Choose settlement after order in case you want an invoice to be created with your oder. The state of the invoice will set according to your capture status

invoice_send_email.label: Send invoice email
invoice_send_email.comment: Send the invoice email automatically after invoice creation.

status_authorized.label: Authorized Status
status_authorized.comment: This status is set, when the payment was successfull and it is authorized.

status_uncertain.label: Uncertain Status
status_uncertain.comment: You can specify the order status for new orders that have an uncertain authorisation status.

status_captured.label: Captured Status
status_captured.comment: You can specify the order status for orders that are captured either directly after the order or manually in the backend.

status_success_after_uncertain.label: Successful Payments after uncertain
status_success_after_uncertain.comment: You can specify the order status for orders that are successful after being in a uncertain state.

status_refused_after_uncertain.label: Refused Payments after uncertain
status_refused_after_uncertain.comment: You can specify the order status for orders that are refused after being in a uncertain state.

alias_manager.label: Alias Manager
alias_manager.comment: The alias manager allows the customer to select from a credit card previously stored. The sensitive data is stored by BNP Paribas Mercanet.

invoice_send_email.comment: Send the invoice email automatically after invoice creation.

capturing.label: Capturing Delay
capturing.comment: This option defines how many days the transaction remains open after authorization. A value of 0 means that the authorization is captured as soon as possible. If you disable this function, you have to manually capture the transaction before it expires We recommend you to define a cron job in your shop especially if the capture delay is greater than 0 in order to automatically update the transaction status. How this can be done is described in the latest version of the integration manual. Please check with BNP Paribas Mercanet which delay is possible and what implication a delay may have.

status_authorized.label: Authorized Status

status_uncertain.comment: You can specify the order status for new orders that have an uncertain authorisation status.
